files.patch:
@@ -1,19 +1,26 @@
 'scope: curriculum':

 'platform: learn':

 'platform: api':

 'scope: tools/scripts':
-  - tools/**/*
-  - .github/**/*
-  - utils/**/*
-  - e2e/**/*

 'scope: i18n':
-  - client/i18n/**/*
-  - config/crowdin/**/*
-  - shared/config/i18n/**/*

+          - shared/config/i18n/**/*
